comments.body:
These types should move to `framework/v1alpha1/interface.go`.
But the actual implementation could go to a separate subpackage (perhaps `framework/v1alpha1/listers`).
The rationale is that plugins and the cluster-autoscaler don't need the implementations.

But followup is fine.

I don't like placing everything in one giant interface.go file. I agree we need to split the implementation and the interface into separate pkgs, and once in separate packages we should rename ```interface.go``` -> ```framework.go```, ```listers.go``` and ```types.go``` should stay (the WaitingPod, CycleState should move to ```types.go``` and remove their files)
